createPool(address,address,uint24).details: fee is converted to stable booleantoken order does not matter

params.fee: 1 if stable, 0 if volatile, else revert

params.stable: True if stable, false if volatile

getPool(address,address,uint24).details: fee is converted to stable boolean.

params.fee: 1 if stable, 0 if volatile, else returns address(0)

setCustomFee(address,uint256).details: A custom fee of zero means the default fee will be used.

setFee(bool,uint256).details: Throws if higher than maximum fee.      Throws if fee is zero.

setVoter(address).details: Only called once to set to Voter.sol - Voter does not have a function      to call this contract method, so once set it's immutable.      This also follows convention of setVoterAndDistributor() in VotingEscrow.sol

voter.details: used to change the name/symbol of the pool by calling emergencyCouncil

allPoolsLength().notice: returns the number of pools created from this factory

createPool(address,address,bool).notice: Create a pool given two tokens and if they're stable/volatile

createPool(address,address,uint24).notice: Support for v3-style pools which wraps around createPool(tokena,tokenB,stable)

getFee(address,bool).notice: Returns fee for a pool, as custom fees are possible.

getPool(address,address,bool).notice: Return address of pool created by this factory

getPool(address,address,uint24).notice: Support for v3-style pools which wraps around getPool(tokenA,tokenB,stable)

isPool(address).notice: Is a valid pool created by this factory.

setCustomFee(address,uint256).notice: Set overriding fee for a pool from the default

setFee(bool,uint256).notice: Set default fee for stable and volatile pools.
